rules.name: coralErosion
rules.description: Dead Coral with Water flowing out of it erodes into Sand

rules.name: foxesSpawnWithSweetBerriesChance
rules.description: A spawned Fox has a chance to hold Sweet Berries

rules.name: gatewaysSpawnChorus
rules.description: Chorus Plants generate with End Gateways in void

rules.name: generateAncientCityPortals
rules.description: Generate Ancient City Portals

rules.name: generateEndPortals
rules.description: Generates End Portals

rules.name: generateMagmaCubeSpawners
rules.description: Generates Magma Cube Spawners

rules.name: generateRandomEndGateways
rules.description: Generate Random End Gateways

rules.name: generateSilverfishSpawners
rules.description: Generates Silverfish Spawners

rules.name: hugeMushroomsSpreadMycelium
rules.description: Huge Mushrooms nearby convert soil to Mycelium

rules.name: lavaFromWanderingTrader
rules.description: Lets the Wandering Trader sell Lava, the old method

rules.name: lightningElectrifiesVines
rules.description: Lightning striking glowstone with attached vines converts them to glow lichen

rules.name: maxWanderingTraderSpawnChance
rules.description: Max wandering trader spawn chance
extras: This starts at 0.025 and increases by 0.025 each time a trader spawn fails
until the max chance is reached.

rules.name: poisonousPotatoesConvertSpiders
rules.description: Spiders convert into Cave Spiders when given Poisonous Potatoes

rules.name: rammingWart
rules.description: A Goat ramming a Nether Wart Block will break it apart

rules.name: renewableAllays
rules.description: Vexes can be converted into Allays with music

rules.name: renewableBuddingAmethysts
rules.description: Surrounding lava by calcite and smooth basalt forms budding amethysts

rules.name: renewableDeepslate
rules.description: Stone can be converted into deepslate with thick potions
extras: either by clicking/dispensing them or with splash potions
With no_splash: splash potion conversion is disabled

rules.name: renewableDiamonds
rules.description: An Anvil falling on a full stack of Coal Blocks compacts it into a Diamond

rules.name: renewableDragonHeads
rules.description: Ender Dragons killed by Charged Creepers drop their heads

rules.name: renewableEchoShards
rules.description: Creatures with Echolocation Drop Echo Shards when Killed with Sonic Booms

rules.name: renewableHeartsOfTheSea
rules.description: Dolphins can find a heart of the sea when given fish

rules.name: renewableNetherrack
rules.description: Netherrack generates as part of Nether Portals spawned floating

rules.name: renewableSwiftSneak
rules.description: Enchanting Tables Near Wardens can Enchant Items with Swift Sneak

rules.name: saplingsDieOnSand
rules.description: Saplings on Sand eventually turn into Dead Bushes

rules.name: shulkerSpawnsOnDragonKill
rules.description: Shulkers spawn on obsidian pillar when Ender Dragon is re-killed

rules.name: tallFlowersFromWanderingTrader
rules.description: Add Tall Flower trades to the Wandering Trader

rules.name: wanderingTraderSpawnRate
rules.description: How often the wandering trader attempts to spawn in ticks
